data.message: I need help not sure if I've been  hacked I can't tag anyone or accept my tags it tells me to sign in each time

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Jennifer. When things don't work on Facebook we want to fix them right away, so please report what you're experiencing with your tags to us here: http://bit.ly/2zSebxl. Additionally, if you think your account has been taken over by someone else, you can secure it here: on.fb.me/XqYbih. -Elizabeth
